DataElement.preferredName: Body Fluid or Substance Specimen Requirement Lineage Specimen Lineage Text Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Liquid and semi liquid substances produced by living organisms to fulfill specific functions or excreted as waste; does not include hormones or enzymes.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Something that is necessary; condition, something that is obligatory._Descent in a line from a common progenitor or source._Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes._Descent in a line from a common progenitor or source._Text; the words of something written._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Body Fluid or Substance Specimen Requirement Lineage
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Liquid and semi liquid substances produced by living organisms to fulfill specific functions or excreted as waste; does not include hormones or enzymes.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Something that is necessary; condition, something that is obligatory._Descent in a line from a common progenitor or source.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Body Fluid or Substance Specimen Requirement
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Liquid and semi liquid substances produced by living organisms to fulfill specific functions or excreted as waste; does not include hormones or enzymes.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Something that is necessary; condition, something that is obligatory.

Concepts.definition: Material produced by living organisms; it can be a necessary constituent of, or product of an organismal process.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Descent in a line from a common progenitor or source.

Concepts.definition: Descent in a line from a common progenitor or source.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes._Descent in a line from a common progenitor or source._Text; the words of something written._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: New; having no previous example or precedent or parallel.

Concepts.definition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To take, obtain, or receive from a source; having been determined by mathematical computation.

Concepts.definition: The source from which something comes or issues; to take, obtain, or receive from a source.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a portion of the whole; any one of two or more samples of something, of the same volume or weight.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a portion of the whole; any one of two or more samples of something, of the same volume or weight.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual entities required by NCI operations and systems. Includes administrative, financial, organizational and quasi-scientific concepts required for NCI operations and systems.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.:Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
